Text: Tnx m8....only 1 question--where do u change resolution? It starts in windowed mode and I can't change it...there's no option in settings and i cant find configuration file in game folder.
Orange, there totally are settings in the options for resolution. And this game is good and all... but the PS1 version is WAYYYYY better. I suggest getting ePSXe and the Life ISO. :D
